name: Berojgar Mahila Sewa Samiti
briefDescription: B.M.S.S is working in social sector for last 30 years.We are committed to see that adequate food,safe drinking water,primary education,livelihood training for below poverty line population,basic health fascilities and family planning are virtually within the rich of very single human at grass root level especially for women & children ensuring that the poor,the needy and the vulnerable live with full dignity.
